info.title: Endatix Platform REST API
info.description: The Endatix Platform is an open-source .NET library for data collection and management. This product is actively developed, and some API design characteristics may evolve. For more information, visit Endatix Documentation.

post.summary: Define a form using AI assistance
post.description: Uses AI to generate or refine a form definition based on the provided prompt.

get.description: Gets all messages for the specified conversation for the current user.

403.description: User does not have access to this conversation.

get.description: Gets the most recent conversation for the specified form for the current user.

post.summary: Assign a role to a user
post.description: Assigns the specified role to a user. Admin-only access.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user to assign the role to.

400.description: Invalid request or role assignment failed.

get.summary: Get roles assigned to a user
get.description: Retrieves all roles assigned to the specified user. Admin-only access.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user to get roles for.

delete.summary: Remove a role from a user
delete.description: Removes the specified role from a user. Admin-only access.

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The ID of the user to remove the role from.

parameters.name: roleName
parameters.description: The name of the role to remove.

400.description: Invalid request or role removal failed.

post.description: Creates a new theme with the provided data.

get.description: Lists all themes with optional pagination and filtering.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number (1-based).

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items per page.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Filter expressions.

delete.description: Deletes a theme by its ID.

parameters.name: themeId
parameters.description: The ID of the theme to delete.

get.description: Gets a theme by its ID.

parameters.name: themeId
parameters.description: The ID of the theme.

patch.description: Updates specific fields of a theme as provided in the request.

parameters.name: themeId
parameters.description: The ID of the theme to update.

put.description: Updates a theme with the provided data.

parameters.name: themeId
parameters.description: The ID of the theme to update.

get.summary: Get tenant settings for the current tenant

post.description: Creates a new form submission

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form for which the submission is made.

get.summary: Get a list of Submissions for a given form
get.description: Returns all submissions for a form given formId. Includes all Form Definitions as well as complete and non-complete responses

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to take.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter expressions

404.description: Form not found. Pass correct formId

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: The ID of the submission to delete.

get.description: Gets a single submission based of its Id and its respective formId

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: The ID of the form submission.

patch.description: Updates a form submission for a given form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form for which the submission is made.

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: The ID the submission that will be updated

200.description: The form submission was updated successfully.

put.description: Updates a form submission for a given form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form for which the submission is made.

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: The ID the submission that will be updated

200.description: The form submission was updated successfully.

post.description: Export submissions for a given form

get.summary: Get a single submission by token
get.description: Gets a single submission based on its token and its respective formId

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: submissionToken
parameters.description: The token of the form submission.

patch.summary: Update a form submission by token
patch.description: Updates a form submission for a given form by token.

parameters.name: submissionToken
parameters.description: The token of the submission that will be updated

200.description: The form submission was updated successfully.

404.description: Form submission not found or invalid token

post.description: Downloads use uploaded files for a given submission
Updates the status of a form submission.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: submissionId
parameters.description: The ID of the submission to update.

200.description: The submission status was updated successfully.

400.description: Invalid status or business rule violation

post.summary: Create a new role with permissions
post.description: Creates a new role for the current tenant with the specified permissions. Admin-only access.

400.description: Invalid request or role creation failed.

delete.description: Deletes the specified role for the current tenant. Admin-only access.

parameters.name: roleName
parameters.description: The name of the role to delete.

400.description: Invalid request or role deletion failed.

post.description: Allows an authenticated user to change their password.
Creates a new form template.

get.description: Lists all form templates with optional pagination.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to take.

parameters.name: formTemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the form template to delete.

get.summary: Get a form template by ID
get.description: Gets a form template by its ID.

parameters.name: formTemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the form template to get.

parameters.name: formTemplateId
parameters.description: The ID of the form template.

post.description: Creates a new form and an active form definition for it.

get.description: Lists all forms with optional pagination.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to take.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: The filter expressions

delete.description: Deletes a form and all its definitions and submissions.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form to delete.

get.description: Gets a form by its ID.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

post.description: Creates a new form definition for a given form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The number of the page

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The number of items to take.

get.description: Gets the active form definition for a given form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

patch.summary: Partially update the active form definition
patch.description: Partially updates the active form definition for a given form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

put.description: Updates the active form definition for a given form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

get.summary: Get a form definition by ID
get.description: Gets a form definition by its ID for a given form.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the form definition.

404.description: Form definition or form not found.

parameters.name: formId
parameters.description: The ID of the form.

parameters.name: definitionId
parameters.description: The ID of the form definition.

404.description: Form definition or form not found.

parameters.name: formId

parameters.name: definitionId

404.description: Form definition or form not found.

post.description: Creates a new custom question with the provided data.

get.description: Lists all custom questions for the current tenant.

post.description: Authenticates a user based on valid credentials and returns JWT token and refresh token
Initiates the logout process for the authenticated user.

get.description: Returns current authenticated user information including roles, permissions, and tenant context. Permissions are resolved server-side for freshness and accuracy.

post.description: Generates a new access token using a valid refresh token.
Creates a new user account in the Endatix application using the provided email and password.

400.description: Registration failed. Please check your input and try again.

post.description: Sends a verification email to the specified email address if the user exists and is not already verified.

200.description: Verification email has been sent successfully.

post.description: Verifies a user's email address using a verification token.

200.description: Email has been successfully verified. Returns the user ID.

post.description: Sends a password reset email to the user.
Resets a user's password.

DefineFormResponse.description: Response model for the AI-assisted form definition.

agentResponse.description: The human-friendly response from the AI agent.

definition.description: The AI-generated or refined form definition.

agentId.description: The agent ID for continuing the conversation.

threadId.description: The thread ID for continuing the conversation.

DefineFormRequest.description: Request model for defining a form using AI assistance.

prompt.description: The prompt to guide the AI in form definition.

definition.description: Optional existing form definition to refine or modify.

agentName.description: Optional assistant ID for continuing a conversation.

threadId.description: Optional thread ID for continuing a conversation.

formId.description: Optional form ID to associate the conversation with a specific form.

AssignRoleResponse.description: Response for assigning a role to a user.

AssignRoleRequest.description: Request for assigning a role to a user.

roleName.description: The name of the role to assign.

GetUserRolesRequest.description: Request for retrieving roles assigned to a user.

RemoveRoleResponse.description: Response for removing a role from a user.

RemoveRoleRequest.description: Request for removing a role from a user.

allOf.description: Response model for creating a theme.

jsonData.description: The JSON data representing the theme properties.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the theme was created.

modifiedAt.description: The date and time when the theme was last modified.

formsCount.description: The count of forms using this theme.

CreateRequest.description: Request model for creating a new theme.

jsonData.description: The JSON data representing theme properties (optional).

DeleteRequest.description: Request model for deleting a theme.

GetByIdRequest.description: Request model for getting a theme by ID.

ListRequest.description: Request model for listing themes with optional pagination and filtering.

allOf.description: Response model for partially updating a theme.

PartialUpdateRequest.description: Request model for partially updating an existing theme.

jsonData.description: The JSON data representing theme properties (optional).

allOf.description: Response model for updating a theme.

UpdateRequest.description: Request model for updating an existing theme.

jsonData.description: The JSON data representing theme properties (optional).

TenantSettingsModel.description: API model for tenant settings with sensitive data masked for security.

submissionTokenExpiryHours.description: Submission token expiration time in hours. Null indicates tokens never expire.

isSubmissionTokenValidAfterCompletion.description: Indicates whether submission tokens remain valid after submission completion.

slackSettings.description: Slack integration settings with sensitive data masked.

webHookSettings.description: Webhook configuration with sensitive data masked.

SlackSettingsModel.description: API model for Slack settings with Token field masked.

endatixHubBaseUrl.description: The Base URL for the Endatix Hub.

channelId.description: The Slack channel ID where notifications are posted.

active.description: Indicates whether Slack integration is active.

WebHookConfigurationModel.description: API model for webhook configuration with sensitive data masked.

events.description: Dictionary of webhook events keyed by event name, with sensitive data masked.

WebHookEventConfigModel.description: API model for webhook event configuration.

isEnabled.description: Indicates whether this webhook event is enabled.

webHookEndpoints.description: List of webhook endpoints with sensitive data masked.

WebHookEndpointConfigModel.description: API model for webhook endpoint configuration.

allOf.description: Request payload to be used with Create endpoint

BaseSubmissionRequest.description: Base class for submission request models with common properties

isComplete.description: Boolean flag to indicate if a submission is complete. Optional

currentPage.description: Current page if the form has multiple pages. Optional

metadata.description: Stringified metadata related to the form submission

reCaptchaToken.description: reCAPTCHA v3 token for bot protection

DeleteSubmissionRequest.description: Request model for deleting a submission.

id.description: The ID of the form definition.

isDraft.description: Indicates if the form definition is a draft.

jsonData.description: The JSON data of the form definition.

formId.description: The ID of the associated form.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the form definition was created.

modifiedAt.description: The date and time when the form definition was last modified.

themeModel.description: The model of the associated theme stored as a stringified JSON object.

customQuestions.description: The list of custom questions' JSON data associated with this form definition.

requiresReCaptcha.description: Indicates if reCAPTCHA is enabled for this form definition.

GetByIdRequest2.description: Request model for getting a form submission by ID.

GetByTokenRequest.description: Request model for getting a form submission by token.

SubmissionDto.description: Represents a submission data transfer object.

id.description: The unique identifier of the submission.

isComplete.description: Indicates if the submission is complete.

jsonData.description: A dictionary containing JSON data related to the submission.

metadata.description: Additional metadata related to the submission.

formId.description: The unique identifier of the form associated with the submission.

formDefinitionId.description: The unique identifier of the form definition associated with the submission.

currentPage.description: The current page of the submission, if applicable.

completedAt.description: The date and time when the submission was completed, if applicable.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the submission was created.

submittedBy.description: The unique identifier of the user who created the submission, if applicable.

LoginResponse.description: A response record used in the Login result

email.description: Email for the user initiating the successful login request

LoginRequest.description: This Represents the request for the "/login" endpoint, handled by the HandleAsync method.

email.description: The Email of the user. Must be a valid email address

LogoutResponse.description: Represents the response model for the logout operation.

message.description: Gets the message included in the Logout response.

AuthorizationData.description:
Authorization data for a user including roles, permissions, admin status and metadata for caching.
Optimized for JSON serialization and client-side caching.

RefreshTokenResponse.description: Represents the response for the "/refresh-token" endpoint

RefreshTokenRequest.description: Represents the request for the "/refresh-token" endpoint

refreshToken.description: The refresh token used to obtain a new access token.

RegisterResponse.description: The response type for the "/register" endpoint returned by the HandleAsync method.

success.description: Indicates whether the registration was successful.

message.description: A message describing the outcome of the registration attempt.

RegisterRequest.description: Represents the request for the "/register" endpoint, handled by the HandleAsync method.

email.description: The email address of the user.

password.description: The password chosen by the user.

confirmPassword.description: The confirmation of the password chosen by the user.

SendVerificationEmailRequest.description: Represents the request for the "/send-verification-email" endpoint.

email.description: The email address to send the verification email to.

VerifyEmailRequest.description: Represents the request for the "/verify-email" endpoint.
